OXPathOutputHandler

public OXPathOutputHandler(java.lang.String iHost,
                           int iPort,
                           org.slf4j.Logger iLogger)
Constructor that takes an output stream and a logger to incorporate into an OXPath process

Parameters:
iHost - the host for the stream receiving OXPathExtractionNode instances
iPort - the port for the stream receiving OXPathExtractionNode instances
iLogger - the logging environment associated with OXPath
Method Detail

getInput

public java.io.ObjectInputStream getInput()
Returns the ObjectInputStream object associated with OXPath output. Not a defensive copy, but the actual object so the handler is exposed to all input

Returns:
the ObjectInputStream object associated with OXPath output
